# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80 to us. Considering its unique features and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
